function.note: T-BioInfo is a multi-omics Research Platform designed to assist researchers with analyzing, modeling and visualization of diverse biological data. The platform is built to handle genomic, transcriptomic,proteomic, metabolomic, structural, visual and clinical data. It can handle processing of raw data formats and prepare those for a machine learning section where it can be processed algorithmically to determine meaningful correlations within a dataset or between multiple datasets. This environment can significantly reduce the time it takes to analyze data by reducing time, providing advanced big data tools and enabling a systems-biology integrative analysis. Once the analysis is complete, the platform provides modeling capabilities that can help investigators simulate biological processes and improve experimental design.

description: A visual bioinformatics platform for multi-omics analysis and bioinformatics education.
name: T-Bio.Info
